alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 10:03PM CDT until May 07 at 9:16AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Gasconade River Basin...including Jerome...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the Happy Hollow Picnic Area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning to a crest of 8.9 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 1015 PM CDT.
